page.title: 11Midelney Manor (2)
page.content: Once ,when I went to open an upstairs window one of the large family portraits fell down beside me!The cord had frayed and finally snapped through old age.There is a visitors' book which every guest signs.The only famous person I met while working there was Roddy Llwellyn who stayed there for a weekend.I met many titled people whom I found to be most friendly.I was supposed to call everyone sir or madam,the sir I could manage but I'm afraid the madam stuck in my throat.I used to clean the family silver once a week and I enjoyed handling the beautiful silver.The furniture was lovely to polish,my favourite being the old refectory table in the hall.There used to be an extensive staff,but no more,just 1 daily help and a gardener once a week.
